name: MathMasterclassAITutorfromEurekaElevenPlus
0:
”Alexa, open Math Tutor”
”Give me a hint”
”What's my rating?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math tutor
des:
Is your child studying math at school? Or are you looking to brush up on your own math? Eureka Eleven Plus, which publishes exam preparation materials, offers this AI-powered Math Masterclass tutorial game as a free service to our readers.

AT HOME or IN CAR
At home, on any Amazon Echo speaker or display.
Driving with a child? Use any Android or iPhone. (1) Download the Alexa app. (2) Press the big blue button. When blue light appears, say "Open Math Tutor". (3) Works best when direct to phone rather than through in-car bluetooth.

COMMANDS TO TRY
WAIT (Amazon forces session to close unless you keep asking for more time)
REPEAT
HINT 
NEW (fresh question)
SCORE (gives your progress report)

AIM
Get the answers right first time, without needing hints on the method, and to achieve this quickly. The AI will report back your progress score when you ask for it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
